name: Plane wreck!!!
description:
this game was made for the stop waiting for Godot wild jam

i joined this jam because i though it was a great opportunity for me to experiment with Godot 3d sinse i never used it before, and i though of making something fairly simple...

So  i made this game in 1 day sinse i wasn't home those cuple of days and i only had like ... 30 hours to work on the game  luckily i already made the 3d models i needed for this project , so it was okay for the most part

i know this game still has some major flaws in example the repetitive game loop,(probably would fix that in the next update)

HAVE FUN!!
